name: Mama Pacha Salt-Free Adobo 3 oz Bag
description: Embrace the rich culinary heritage of Latin cuisine with every sprinkle of Mama Pacha Adobo. Crafted without preservatives or added salt and packed in an eco-friendly, recyclable, and refillable bag for the purest flavor.

name: Mama Pacha Salt-Free Sazón 3 oz Bag
description: Experience the vibrant taste of Latin tradition with Mama Pacha Sazón. No preservatives, no added salt—just clean, all-natural color and flavor packed in an eco-friendly, recyclable, refillable bag.
notes: Annatto, coriander, garlic — clean color & flavor.

name: Catering Trays – Mama Pacha Sabor Trifongo
description: Experience the rich, iconic flavor of our Trifongo – Mama Pacha Sabor Style. A Boricua blend of mashed green plantains, yuca, and sweet plantains, seasoned with garlic, herbs, and our signature Caribbean mojo.
notes: Soft, savory, and full of island soul. Perfect with pernil, pollo guisado, seafood, or any classic Caribbean meal.

name: Catering Trays – Mama Pacha Sabor Coditos (Macaroni Salad)
description: Enjoy the classic, creamy flavor of our Coditos – Mama Pacha Sabor Style. Tender macaroni mixed with crisp vegetables, a perfectly seasoned mayo-based dressing, and a touch of Puerto Rican sazón.
notes: Refreshing, smooth, and full of island comfort. Perfect for BBQs, family gatherings, and holidays.

name: Catering Trays – Mama Pacha Sabor Yuca al Ajillo
description: Savor the authentic flavor of our Yuca al Ajillo – Mama Pacha Sabor Style. Tender cassava tossed in garlic-infused olive oil with onions, herbs, and a touch of citrus for a true Puerto Rican taste.
notes: Rich, simple, and full of island soul. Pairs beautifully with roasted meats, pernil, and poultry.

name: Catering Trays – Mama Pacha Sabor Arroz con Gandules
description: Savor the comforting, authentic taste of our Arroz con Gandules – Mama Pacha Sabor Style. Fluffy, perfectly seasoned rice simmered with tender gandules, aromatics, and a traditional Caribbean sofrito.
notes: Warm, hearty, and full of island soul—enjoy it as the perfect side or as a stand-alone dish.

name: Mama Pacha Sabor Empanadas (Uncooked)
description: Handmade turnovers, ready to bake or fry at home. Each order includes 4 empanadas per filling—crispy, flaky, and packed with flavor.
notes: Uncooked and frozen; fry or bake fresh at home.

variants.label: Shredded Beef (4 x 6" empanadas)
variants.notes: Savory shredded beef with olives and potatoes, seasoned with Mama Pacha Sazón.

variants.label: Chicken (4 x 6" empanadas)
variants.notes: Juicy chicken with olives and potatoes, elevated with Mama Pacha Sazón.

variants.label: Patelón (4 x 6" empanadas)
variants.notes: Ground beef layered with sweet plantains and cheese—Patelón-inspired filling.

variants.label: Pizza (4 x 6" empanadas)
variants.notes: Melty cheese + zesty sauce inside a golden, crispy shell.

variants.label: Veggie (4 x 6" empanadas)
variants.notes: Hearty seasoned veggies with heritage spices—crispy, bold, and satisfying.

extraInfo.bulkOffer: Special pricing available for orders of 50+ empanadas.
options: Uncooked (ready to bake or fry at home)
Cooked (fried or baked) – fresh and ready to enjoy

name: Mama Pacha Sabor Pulled Pork or Chicken
description: Slow-cooked, seasoned pulled pork or chicken with Mama Pacha’s signature Adobo and Sazón. Tender, juicy, and full of bold island flavor—perfect on its own, in sandwiches, tacos, or empanada fillings.
notes: Rich, savory, and slow-roasted to perfection.
